mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam (title, description, duration, total_score, pass_score, grade_id, create_time, status) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{duration}, #{totalScore}, #{passScore}, #{gradeId}, #{createTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE exam SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, duration = #{duration}, total_score = #{totalScore}, pass_score = #{passScore}, grade_id = #{gradeId}, status = #{status} WHERE exam_id = #{examId}
mapper.select: SELECT e.*, g.gradeName FROM exam e LEFT JOIN grade g ON e.grade_id = g.gradeId WHERE e.exam_id = #{examId}
